name: Font Awesome Official Icon Component (Free + Pro)
description:
An official Font Awesome icon component that uses OTF files and ligatures to make adding icons (and swapping styles) simple and easy.


Includes components for:

  • Font Awesome 5 Free
  • Font Awesome 5 Pro
  • Font Awesome 6 Free (Beta)
  • Font Awesome 6 Pro (Beta)


Features:

  • All Font Awesome styles (except Duotone)
  • Padding on/off
  • Multiple sizes: .75x | 1x | 1.25x | 1.5x | 2x | 2.5x | 3x


How to Use:

  • Download the "desktop" files for your chosen version of Font Awesome.
  • Install the included OTF files into your font manager.
  • Double-click into the component instance and type your desired icon name into the text layer.


Pick the Right Icon:

  • Explore version 5 icons here: https://fontawesome.com/icons
  • Explore version 6 icons here: https://fontawesome.com/v6.0/icons
